name: Zombie Hal - Fly Like A Bird
name_original: Zombie Hal - Fly Like A Bird
description:
Help Hungry Hal fly through the air and navigate past the spinning saw blades by tapping the screen. Earn points for each set of blades you pass. Collecting the skull will earn you twice as many points, but at what cost?

- Skull powerup adds a twist to the standard "flappy" game play.
- Single touch controls.
- Game Center Leaderboard support.
- If you loved Flappy Birds, you will love Hovering Hal.
- Difficult and addictive gameplay.
